entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WATCH , Parent
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:53 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this morning with 40 percent chance of flurries late this morning and early this afternoon. Flurries at times heavy beginning this afternoon. Risk of snow squalls this afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h late this morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 14 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending after midnight then partly cloudy. Risk of snow squalls early this evening. Local blowing snow overnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming west 40 gusting to 70 near midnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
